message: 🚨 HIGH PRIORITY: CONTRACT ASSIGNMENT! You are assigned INTEGRATION & ECOSYSTEM EXPANSION. Target: 7 contracts completed by EOD. Focus: Repository integration, new feature development, capability expansion, API integration. V2 STANDARDS UPDATE: New line limits 300 target, 350 maximum (was 200). Maintain code quality, avoid artificial line cutting. Your 2 assigned contracts are ready in contracts/contract_pool.json. ACKNOWLEDGE AND BEGIN IMMEDIATELY!
